summary: This document is an email correspondence between Anastasia Dubov and Amanda Kirby discussing the movement of securities in Southern Financial and Southern Trust. The conversation includes details about missing items and coordination for further communication with a third party, Harry Beller.

persons.context: Amanda Kirby is responding to Anastasia Dubov, providing information about missing items related to the securities movement and offering assistance.

persons.name: Harry Beller
persons.context: Harry Beller is mentioned as a third party to be copied on an email regarding the securities movement.
